product_description: Experience ultimate adaptability and make the most of your Oakley Meta HSTN with Transitions® lenses. These lenses automatically adapt to changing light conditions by seamlessly responding to UV light, darkening outdoors and returning to clear when indoors. Enjoy a continuous visual performance in changing light environments, and ultimate light protection* whether you're hitting the gym or soaking up the sun at the beach. Transitions® lenses on Oakley Meta HSTN ensure you're always ready in any light – no matter where the day takes you. LEGAL Disclaimer: *Block 100% UVA & UVB rays, darken outdoors and filter 26-51% of blue violet light indoors and 78-93% outdoors across colors tests done on CR39 lenses. Blue-violet light is measured between 400nm and455nm (ISO TR 20772:2018)
